Game: Happy Feet 2006-11-14T00:00:00-08:00 Happy Feet is based on Warner Bros' comedy adventure. You'll jump into the shoes of Mumble, a young penguin born into a nation of singing Emperor Penguins. In this land, each Penguin needs a Heartsong to attract a soul mate. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/b1d40485-4090-4c02-982f-30600e523496.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/25b1c8bb-0942-44f6-8ead-367466544c82.jpg E - Everyone
